Description: String og 58 graduated glass beads of different colours (mostly black or dark grey, with a few light yellow, green and dark blue), of different shapes (globular, twisted, fusiform, moniliform, discoid or cylindrical).
Curator's comments: Concerning glass beads, see See W.M.F. Petrie, Tanis ii, Nebesheh and Defenneh, p. 79 § 79.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (p. 79 § 79)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.86, p.187, pl.29)
